title: In order to make the CDS viable, the Municipal Commissioner shall be competent to sanction any relax
clause_text: In order to make the CDS viable, the Municipal Commissioner shall be competent to sanction any relaxation in marginal open spaces except front marginal open space and parking requirements wherever necessary due to bonafide hardship, for reasons to be recorded in
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:
